At Allianz we are committed to making it easier for you to serve your clients insurance needs, we have added some new features to our Allianzbroker.com website that we think will improve your online experience with us and get your feedback for more improvements in 2020.

 

New Noticeboard
To keep you updated on new offerings and changes to existing products.

 

New Product Pages
We have new product information pages where you can find all of the information you need to service your clients with our products.

 

New Online Feedback Tool
At Allianz, we value your feedback on your online experience with us. We have launched an online feedback tool, which you can find at the bottom of every page of our website.
Give some feedback now

*To access the Allianzbroker.com website you need to have a registered Username & Password linked to your agency number. If you do not have a username & password please contact your Customer Relationship Representative and they will be happy to provide one for you.

Allianz Small Business Online

We offer 3 great Packages for small businesses:
 

SME Retail
For independently owned retail businesses. From restaurants to newsagents, butchers to grocers, it offers a wide range of cover to provide the right insurance solution for a business. Find out more.

 

SME Office
Our Online SME Office package offers a range of covers to suit a variety of office based businesses, from secretarial services to graphic designers, to Doctors’ surgeries. Find out more.

 

SMP Property Owners
Our online SMP Property Owners package is designed to provide protection against damage and legal action with optional covers, such as loss of rent and employers’ liability available as required. Find out more.
